Game

Class Grid

  • java.lang.Object
    • javafx.scene.Node
      • javafx.scene.Parent
        • javafx.scene.layout.Region
          • javafx.scene.layout.Pane
            • javafx.scene.layout.GridPane
              • Game.Grid
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    javafx.css.Styleable, javafx.event.EventTarget

    public class Grid
extends javafx.scene.layout.GridPane
    This is the grid class which extends grid pane. It is used to make grid in which game is to be played. Moreover the game is played in this class only.

      This function changes the color of the grid.

      This function deals with the nextColorTurn which is responsible for changing the color of the grid to the color of the player who has the turn.

      This function deals with the counter which is responsible for turn of each player.

      This function checks for invalid move and throws InvalidMoveException.

      This function check and eliminate players.
      void disable()
      This function disables click on the grid.Used while transition animation is been played.
      void displayWinner()
      This function is responsible for showing an alert displaying the winner and it also helps in stopping all the redundant recursive calls after game is finsihed by changing a flag.

      This function is used to enable click on the grid after transition animation is completed.

    • Constructor Detail

      • Grid

        public Grid(int x,
            int y,
            Settings.Player[] players,
            int count)
        This is the constructor for Grid class. In it we initialize grid with an 2D array of cells.
        Parameters:
        x - width of the grid.
        y - height of the grid.
        players - array of players playing the game.
        count - integer for passing turn to players

      • Grid

        public Grid(Status.GridStatus _grid,
            Settings.Player[] players)
        This Constructor of grid is used during undo and resume.
        Parameters:
        _grid - Object of GridStatus class which stores status of grid at any point of time.
        players - array of players playing the game.

        public void setWidth(int width)

      • OrbsEvent1

        public void OrbsEvent1(int x,
                       int y,
                       Settings.Player[] players)
        This function handles click on cells with critical mass as 2. Do so by placing an orb or by splitting it.
        Parameters:
        x - coordinate of cell along the x axis.
        y - coordinate of cell along the y axis.
        players - array of players playing the game.

      • OrbsEvent2

        public void OrbsEvent2(int x,
                       int y,
                       Settings.Player[] players)
        This function handles click on cells with critical mass as 3. Do so by placing orbs or by splitting them.
        Parameters:
        x - coordinate of cell along the x axis.
        y - coordinate of cell along the y axis.
        players - array of players playing the game.

      • OrbsEvent3

        public void OrbsEvent3(int x,
                       int y,
                       Settings.Player[] players)
        This function handles click on cells with critical mass as 4. Do so by placing orbs or by splitting them.
        Parameters:
        x - coordinate of cell along the x axis.
        y - coordinate of cell along the y axis.
        players - array of players playing the game.

      • recursion

        public void recursion(int x,
                      int y,
                      Settings.Player[] players)
        This function handles the splitting of orbs.Its an recursive algorithm which splits orbs and then recursively calls itself at places where new orbs have been placed if there is a chance of splitting there also. It is also responsible for transition animation while splitting of orbs.
        Parameters:
        x - coordinate of cell along the x axis.
        y - coordinate of cell along the y axis.
        players - array of players playing the game.

      • place

        public void place(int x,
                  int y,
                  Settings.Player[] players)
        This function places an atom of the player whom is in turn at that point of time
        Parameters:
        x - coordinate of cell along the x axis.
        y - coordinate of cell along the y axis.
        players - array of players playing the game.

      • actionListener

        public void actionListener(int i,
                           int j,
                           int y,
                           int x,
                           Settings.Player[] players)
        This function attaches action listener to a cell present in the grid. This function is called for every cell of the grid.
        Parameters:
        i - coordinate along the x axis of the cell.
        j - coordinate along the y axis of the cell.
        y - height of the grid.
        x - width of the grid.
        players - array of players playing the game.

      • checkPlayers

        public boolean checkPlayers(Settings.Player[] players)
        This function check and eliminate players. It also conveys the message containing information that game is finished or not through returning a boolean value.
        Parameters:
        players - array of players playing the game.
        Returns:
        flag boolean value,tells whether game is finished or not.

      • animation1

        public void animation1(int x,
                       int y,
                       Settings.Player[] players,
                       Settings.Player cs)
        This function is responsible for animation on a group of single orb.
        Parameters:
        x - coordinate of cell along the x axis.
        y - coordinate of cell along the y axis.
        players - array of players playing the game.

      • animation2

        public void animation2(int x,
                       int y,
                       Settings.Player[] players,
                       Settings.Player cs)
        This function is responsible for animation on a group of 2 orbs.
        Parameters:
        x - coordinate of cell along the x axis.
        y - coordinate of cell along the y axis.
        players - array of players playing the game.

      • animation3

        public void animation3(int x,
                       int y,
                       Settings.Player[] players,
                       Settings.Player cs)
        This function is responsible for animation on a group of three orbs.
        Parameters:
        x - coordinate of cell along the x axis.
        y - coordinate of cell along the y axis.
        players - array of players playing the game.

      • disable

        public void disable()
        This function disables click on the grid.Used while transition animation is been played.

      • enable

        public void enable()
        This function is used to enable click on the grid after transition animation is completed.

      • checkCounter

        public void checkCounter(Settings.Player[] players)
        This function deals with the counter which is responsible for turn of each player. It changes the counter to point to the first player after the turn of last player.
        Parameters:
        players - array of players playing the game.

      • checkClr

        public void checkClr(Settings.Player[] players)
        This function deals with the nextColorTurn which is responsible for changing the color of the grid to the color of the player who has the turn. It changes the nextColorTurn to point to the first player after turn of the last.
        Parameters:
        players - array of players playing the game.

      • checkMove

        public void checkMove(int x,
                      int y,
                      Settings.Player[] players)
               throws Game.InvalidMoveException
        This function checks for invalid move and throws InvalidMoveException. It does so by checking the current player assigned to the orb and comparing it with the player in turn.
        Parameters:
        x - coordinate of cell along the x axis.
        y - coordinate of cell along the y axis.
        players - array of players playing the game.
        Throws:
        Game.InvalidMoveException

      • saveState

        public Status.GameGUIStatus saveState()
        This function saves state of grid after each turn.
        Returns:
        GameGUIStatus object to store Game Status

      • ReturnUndo

        public Status.GameGUIStatus ReturnUndo()
        This function returns object of gridStatus class. It is used in undo functionality.
        Returns:
        gsundo object of the gridStatus class.

      • changeColor

        public void changeColor(javafx.scene.paint.Color color)
        This function changes the color of the grid. It is passed with color as the parameter with help of nextColorTurn and then through traversing in the grid,color is changed.
        Parameters:
        color -

      • displayWinner

        public void displayWinner()
        This function is responsible for showing an alert displaying the winner and it also helps in stopping all the redundant recursive calls after game is finsihed by changing a flag.
